name: Peluchinga World
description: Peluchinga con fondo del planeta tierra
additional_info: Pon este magnifico tema de la tierra que est√° en Full Hight Definition.
css:
/* 
||<================================================================================>||
||* Author      : ZandoGeek                                                         ||
||* Created     : 2014 | 02 | 06                                                    ||
||* Updated     :                                                                   ||
||* Version     : 1 Build 3                                                         ||
||* Description : A colorful & dark theme for Peluchinga.org                        ||
||* Usage       : For use with Stylish, a Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/)||
||<================================================================================>||
*/
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain(peluchinga.org)
{

/* Cursors */

*     {cursor: url("http://reloaded.site88.net/Data/aero_arrow.cur")
, default !important}
a, a * {cursor: url("http://reloaded.site88.net/Data/aero_link.cur")
, pointer !important}

html  ,

html *:not(:empty) ,

html *:after ,
html *:before
{ background-image : some!important

}

html
{ background-color : #333 !important
; border-color     : #444 !important
}

body
{ background-color : transparent !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : #ccc !important
}

body * ,
html *:after ,
html *:before
{ background-color : transparent !important
; border-color     : transparent        !important
; color            : inherit     !important
; text-shadow      : none        !important
}

.head  ,
.header  ,
*[id*="title"]  ,
*[id*="Title"]  ,
*[id*="head"]  ,
*[id*="Head"]  ,
*[class*="header"]  ,
*[class*="Header"]  ,
*[id*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[id*="Hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="Hlavicka"]
{ background-color : #404040 !important
}

#g_toup {
height: 65px;
border-bottom: 1px solid #202020;
background: url(http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9274/finalmh.gif) repeat-x top center #000;
background-image: url(http://puu.sh/6V1cN.jpg);
background-position-x: 50%;
background-position-y: 0%;
background-size: initial;
background-repeat-x: repeat;
background-repeat-y: no-repeat;
background-attachment: initial;
background-origin: initial;
background-clip: initial;
background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
}
.navlist a  ,
.Navlist a  ,
*.navigation a  ,
*[id*="menu"] a  ,
*[id*="Menu"] a  ,
*[id*="navig"] a  ,
*[id*="Navig"] a  ,
*[id*="-nav"] a  ,
*[id*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[id$="nav"] a  ,
*[id$="Nav"] a  ,
*[class*="menu"] a  ,
*[class*="Menu"] a  ,
*[class*="navig"] a  ,
*[class*="Navig"] a  ,
*[class*="-nav"] a  ,
*[class*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[class$="nav"] a  ,
*[class$="Nav"] a
{ background-color : #282839 !important
}

#bg_perfil {
background: none;
background-image: none;
background-position-x: 331px;
background-position-y: 0px;
background-size: initial;
background-repeat-x: no-repeat;
background-repeat-y: repeat;
background-attachment: initial;
background-origin: initial;
background-clip: initial;
background-color: white;
overflow: hidden;
}

#bg_home {
background: none;
background-image: none;
background-position-x: 10px;
background-position-y: 0px;
background-size: initial;
background-repeat-x: no-repeat;
background-repeat-y: repeat;
background-attachment: initial;
background-origin: initial;
background-clip: initial;
background-color: transparent;
overflow: hidden;
}

#bg_post {
background: none;
background-image: none;
background-position-x: 331px;
background-position-y: 0px;
background-size: initial;
background-repeat-x: no-repeat;
background-repeat-y: repeat;
background-attachment: initial;
background-origin: initial;
background-clip: initial;
background-color: white;
overflow: hidden;
}

div[class*=menu][class*=vertical]
{ background-color: #334 !important
}

#menu a:hover  ,
#navigation a:hover
,
*[class*="menu"][class*="item"]:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
}

div[id*="side"]  ,
div[id*="Side"]  ,
div[class*="side"]  ,
div[class*="Side"]
{ background-color : #404040 !important
}

aside  ,
.aside  ,
#aside
{ background-color : #444 !important
}


footer  ,
div[id*="foot"]  ,
div[class*="foot"]  ,
div[id*="paticka"]  ,
div[class*="paticka"]
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

*[class*="heading"]  ,
*[class*="Heading"]  ,
*[id*="heading"]  ,
*[id*="Heading"]  ,
*[class*="nadpis"]  ,
*[class*="Nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="Nadpis"]
{ border-color : #888 !important
; color        : #eee !important
}

h1
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #eee !important
; color            : #fff !important
}

h2  ,
h3  ,
h4  ,
h5  ,
h6  ,
caption  , 
thead  ,
th  ,
lh  , 
dl dt  , 
html fieldset legend   
{ background-color : #222 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color            : #eee !important
}

blockquote  ,
code  , 
xmp  ,
pre
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

td
{ border-color     : #555 !important
}

hr
{ background-color : #666 !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : #666 !important
}

*[id*="important"]  ,
*[id*="Important"]  ,
*[class*="important"]  ,
*[class*="Important"]
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #fff !important
}

b  ,
b *  ,
i  ,
i *
{ border-color : #555 !important
; color        : #eee !important
}

em  ,
em *  ,
strong  ,
strong *
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #fff !important
}

#current  ,
#selected  ,
#active  ,
.current  ,
.selected  ,
.active  ,
.current a ,
.selected a  ,
.active a
{ background-color : #000 !important
; color            : #fff !important
}

*[id*=Current]  ,
*[id*=Selected]  ,
*[id*=Active]  ,
*[id*=current]  ,
*[id*=selected]  ,
*[id*=active] ,
*[class*=Current]  ,
*[class*=Selected]  ,
*[class*=Active]  ,
*[class*=current]  ,
*[class*=selected]  ,
*[class*=active] ,
*[id*=Current] a ,
*[id*=Selected] a  ,
*[id*=Active] a  ,
*[id*=current] a  ,
*[id*=selected] a  ,
*[id*=active] a ,
*[class*=Current] a  ,
*[class*=Selected] a  ,
*[class*=Active] a  ,
*[class*=current] a  ,
*[class*=selected] a  ,
*[class*=active] a
{ background-color : #111 !important
; color            : #eee !important
}

.copyright
{ color : #ccc !important
}
.error
{ color : #f66 !important
}
.warning
{ color : #f99 !important
}
.example
{ color : #cff !important
}
.issue
{ color : #f99 !important
}
.note
{ color : #cff !important
}
.search
{ color : #cff !important
}

*[irrelevant]
{
}


table
{ background-color: transparent !important
}
thead , tfoot
{ background-color: #333 !important
}

html body *[onclick]:hover ,
html body *[ondblclick]:hover ,
a[href^='javascript:'] ,
a[href='#']
{ background-color : #300 !important
}

label[for]  ,
a:link  ,
a:link *
{ border-color : #399 !important
; color        : #9ef !important
}

label[for]:focus  ,
label[for]:hover  ,
a:link:focus  ,
a:link:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #9ef !important
; color            : #eff !important
}

a:link:focus *  ,
a:link:hover *
{ border-color : #9ef !important
; color        : #eff !important
}

a:visited  ,
a:visited *
{ border-color : #690 !important
; color        : #9c3 !important
}

a:visited:focus  ,
a:visited:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #9c3 !important
; color            : #cf9 !important
}

a:visited:focus *  ,
a:visited:hover *
{ border-color : #9c3 !important
; color        : #cf9 !important
}

a:active  ,
a:active *
{ border-color : #600 !important
; color        : #f33 !important
}

html button  ,
html select  ,
html input
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

html input[type="password"]
{ background-color : #755 !important
}

html textarea  ,
html input[type="text"]  ,
html input:not([type])
{ background-color : #555 !important
; color: #fff !important
}

html textarea:hover  ,
html input[type="text"]:hover  ,
html input:not([type]):hover
{
}

html input:hover ,
html button:hover ,
html select:hover ,
html textarea:hover
{ color : #fff !important
; border-color: #ccc !important
; background-color : #444 !important
}

html textarea:focus  ,
html input:focus  ,
html textarea:focus ,
html button:focus
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color: #ccc !important
}
html textarea:focus:hover  ,
html input:focus:hover  ,
html button:focus:hover ,
html textarea:focus:hover
{ border-color     : #fff !important
}

html input[type="password"]:focus
{ background-color : #300 !important
}

input[disabled]
{ color : #888 !important
}

html button  ,
html select  ,
html input  ,
html textarea
{ -moz-appearance : none !important
; background-image: none !important 
}

*[class*='content']  ,
li:hover li
{ background-color : transparent !important
}

div[id^=webdeveloper]
{ background-color : #333 !important
}

div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #630 !important
}

td.quantifier > div  ,
div.graph > div#tomGraph
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

span#__firefox-findbar-search-id
{ background-color : #9ff !important
}

#pop
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

div#lbHoverNav a#lbPrev ,
div#lbHoverNav a#lbNext
{ background-color:  transparent !important
}

div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #630 !important
}

Html,
Body,
Div#nav,
Div#footer,
Div#pmyr_div,
Div.nvlink,
Div.author,
Div.dbx-content,
Div.threaddetails.td,
Div.art-Header-png,
Div.clearfix.copy,
Div.clearfix.notifi_cuerpo,
Div.register_back,
Div.comunidades.sidebarR,
Div.tipsy-inner,
Div.ui-widget-overlay,
Div#scbar.cl,
Div.man_show,
Div.com-2,
Div.com-3,
Div.com-3-top,
Div#tb_.hdm-top,
Div.hdm-topm,
Div#vista_previa,
Div.clearfix.data-tip,
Div#topBar,
Div#navbar.navbar,
Div.tcatLeft,
Div#header,
Div#under_header,
Div#marsfeed,
Div#menu,
Div#main.clearfix.homes,
Div.tooltip-c.compact.clearfix,
Div.modal-wrapper.rounded,
Div#main.clearfix,
Div.menu-tabs-perfil.clearfix,
Div.perfil-data.clearfix,
Div.reg-form.clearfix,
Div.ipsTooltip_inner,
Div.threadnotification.td,
Div.ui-ac.ui-dialog-content.ui-widget-content,
Div.floatR.comment-body,
Div.title.clearfix,
Div.clearfix.comment-box.is-normal,
Div.clearfix.comment-box.my-comment,
Div.clearfix.comment-box.is-user,
Div.clearfix.comment-box.is-staff,
Div.box.sticky.musica.real-shadow,
Div.rating0.nonsticky,
Div.rating1.nonsticky,
Div.rating2.nonsticky,
Div.rating3.nonsticky,
Div.rating4.nonsticky,
Div.rating5.nonsticky,
Div.rating6.nonsticky,
Div.rating7.nonsticky,
Div.rating8.nonsticky,
Div.rating9.nonsticky,
Div.icon0.rating0.nonsticky,
Div.icon7.rating0.nonsticky,
Div.wrapper.clearfix,
Div.b-reg-an.clearfix,
Div.forumrow.table,
Div.forumrow,
Div.threadinfo.thread,
Div.threadpostedin.td.alt,
Div.dialog-preview.ui-dialog-content.ui-widget-content,
Div.ui-dialog-buttonpane.ui-widget-content.ui-helper-clearfix,
Div#reify-bugmenot-bmnWrapper14.reify-bugmenot-bmnWrapper,
Div#full-col.post,
form#scbar_form,
#jqContextMenu,
#seguir,
#unirse,
#divResult,
#divDic,
A.nombre,
A.btn.v.radio-on,
A.require-login.button.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-corner-all.ui-button-text-only,
A.btn.g.require-login,
A.btn.g.not-following,
A.btn.g.leave,
A.btn.g.join,
A.btn.v.floatR,
A.button.tags.ui-button.ui-widget.ui-state-default.ui-corner-all.ui-button-text-only,
Body#index,
dl.threadlastpost.td.alt,
dl.threadlastpost.td,
dl.threadimod.td,
Input.text-inp.text.cuenta-save-1.ui-corner-all.form-input-text.box-shadow-soft,
Li.clearfix.tema_sticky,
Li,
Li.imodselector.threadbit,
Li#tb_1.hdm-hover,
P.nonthread,
Span.ui-button-text,
Span.show-more,
Table.obertka,
Td.thead,
Ul.floatcontainer,
Ul.clearfix,
Ul.threadstats.td.alt,
Ul.zebra_recent,
Ul.post-share-bottom.rounded.clearfix.post-share-list,
Html#vbulletin_html,
H2,
H3.blocksubhead
{
Background        : url("http://www.wallsave.com/wallpapers/1920x1080/planeta-tierra/1045826/planeta-tierra-pin-fondos-de-pantalla-escritorio-on-1045826.jpg") 
Fixed Repeat Center!important
; Background-color: Black !important
; Color           : #6cebeb !important
}
a:Link
{
Color: #0099AA !important;
}
a:Visited
{
Color: #99FF66 !important;
}
a:Hover
{
Background-color: #222334 !important;
Text-decoration: none !important;
Color: Purple !important;
}

}
